original_text: Their tails are like the branches of a cedar tree. Their legs are thick and very strong. Their tails are like the branches of a cedar tree. Their legs are thick and very strong. Their tails are like the branches of a cedar tree.
korean_text: 그것이 꼬리 치는 것은 백향목이 흔들리는 것 같고 그 넓적다리 힘줄은 서로 얽혀 있으며

sentences.original_text: Their tails are like the branches of a cedar tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 꼬리는 레바논 백향목 가지와 같으며
